name: Walter Jackson
description: '''Walter Jackson''' (March 19, 1938 â€“ June 20, 1983) was an American [[soul music|soul]] [[ballad]] singer who had a string of hits on the US [[R&B chart]] between the mid-1960s and early 1980s.  His biggest successes included "It's All Over" in 1964, "It's An Uphill Climb to the Bottom" in 1966 and "[[Feelings (Morris Albert song)|Feelings]]", a cover of the [[Morris Albert]] pop hit, in 1976.
